lines.text:
[Slamming his fist down onto the table as he speaks]
MY BROTHER DIDN'T KILL ANYBODY, some mother FUCKER slung him from his neck from the fucking ceiling!
FUCK YOUR EYEWITNESS! This is bullshit, alright? If you wanna book me, book me.
They say that Jack the Ripper was surgeon... this maybe the same as our current killer

[dressing the old woman's hand wound]
"You free Saturday night?"
This is an emergency. May we come in?
